thread.title: BRIEF-IBC Advanced Alloys Narrows 1H Loss By 59 Pct YoY

title: BRIEF-IBC Advanced Alloys Narrows 1H Loss By 59 Pct YoY
text: February 28, 2018 / 11:20 AM / Updated 22 minutes ago BRIEF-IBC Advanced Alloys Narrows 1H Loss By 59 Pct YoY Reuters Staff Feb 28 (Reuters) - Ibc Advanced Alloys Corp: * IBC ADVANCED ALLOYS REPORTS FISCAL Q2 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS * IBC ADVANCED ALLOYS CORP - CO NARROWS ITS FISCAL 1H 2018 LOSS FOR PERIOD BY 59% YEAR-ON-YEAR * IBC ADVANCED ALLOYS - CONSOLIDATED SALES REVENUE UP 32% IN QUARTER TO $4.7 MILLION, AS COMPARED TO $3.6 MILLION IN QUARTER ENDED DECEMBER 31, 2017 * IBC ADVANCED ALLOYS CORP - REITERATES GOAL OF ACHIEVING PROFITABILITY IN FIRST CALENDAR QUARTER OF 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
